comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Using the zoom function at the Persistent URL, I daresay that the man at the far right in this boat is the same man at the far right in this photograph: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3169117294/

comment.author: 13639096@N06
comment._content:
If it is the Lane Cove River, then it is above the current weir and clearly before the weir was built.   It is not worth rowing in a four above the present weir on Fuller's road.  The reason I think it above the weir is that there are no mangroves and there are mangroves downstream of the weir.
Wonderful photo.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: It looks more like the Hacking River to me.
